Mantella



*Mantella keeps crawling but collasps a  near the outside of the jungle and
enters stasis lock*

----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, August 21, 2000 3:03 PM
Subject: I Have Returned


> Yes, I am back, but that's no reason for happy dances. Glad to see the
> reaction to my return. I'll now take back the chars that I lent out before
> last friday.
>
> Forgive me if this post is a bit inaccurate, but I just read a whole lot
of
> posts, and am a bit confused.
>
> ::Zardus/Prowl/Autofire/Striker/Shredder/Rex/Firearm/Kluster::
>
> Zardus opens his eyes. He wasn't feeling well. The Alliance commander
looks
> down at his arm, seeing the last traces of the shimmering which had phazed
> him out days before dissapear. He hated that feeling, it always left him
> dizzy. Zardus clentches his fist, relieved to have a physical body once
> again, after his absence. He stands up, looking around the lab of the
> Alliance base.
>
> Walking toward a computer console, the Alliance commander presses a few
> buttons, a table rising out of the floor in the middle of the room. On the
> table was strapped the femm that Reptilica and Bloodystrike had brought in
a
> few days ago (IR's new char).
>
> Zardus taps his wrist, his wrist comp popping up. Tapping a few buttons,
he
> checks the messages he had recieved. He smiles at Skulletron's report. The
> pair seemed to be doing well.... But it was too dangerous to send a reply,
> the Cybertronian Fire would probably detect it.
>
> Zardus looks over the 'resumes' from Inzola and Stranato. He activates his
> comm-link, sending the two bots a transmission (I'm assuming that the
resumes
> had their names on them).
>
> "Inzola and Stranato," he says into his comm, "I understand that you wish
to
> join. Is this correct?"
>
> Zardus looks back at the femm on the table. She'd have to wait, he had
more
> important things to do. The Alliance commander turns around, exiting the
lab
> and heading for the bridge.
>
> "All Alliance members," he says into his comm-link, sending the
transmission
> to all Alliance bots except for Skulletron and Feline (because they're in
the
> CF), "I'm back. I'll be at the bridge catching up on recent events."
>
> He switches his comm to Nemesis Enforcer's frequency.
>
> "Nemesis, I have returned, has anything major happened lately?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Prowl appears back at the CR room of the Cybertronian Fire. He looks
around,
> a bit dazed.
>
> "Computer, locate Iron Raptor," he says to the nearest console, a location
> coming up on the screen. Prowl walks off toward the location, eager to see
> the bot he loves once again.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Autofire looks after Paralysis as the bot runs off toward the gunfire,
then
> turning to look at Adrax.
>
> "Should we help 'im?" he asks, looking around the room.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Striker appears back at the Ark, nearly falling as his body phazes in. He
was
> dizzy, the ussual result of these sort of things. The Maximal looks
around,
> noting that alot more panels have fallen from the cealing. He activates
his
> comm-link, setting it on a Maximal frequency.
>
> "I'm back, everyone," he says into it, "What'd I miss?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Shredder appears in the jungle, looking around. Mantella was nowhere to be
> seen. His scanners reported that she was a bit away, slowly heading toward
> the Destron base. He takes off at a jog, heading for her.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Seeing BrightBlade and Gangon fall, Firearm walks over to BrightBlade,
> picking her up and putting her over his shoulder, Rex doing the same to
> Gangon. Firearm activates his comm-link, sending a transmission to
Chordate.
>
> "Sir, the intruders are neutralized. What do you want done with them?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster blinks, appearing in the cargo hold of the CF. He activates his
comm,
> heading for the bridge.
>
> "I'm back, Chordate, how's the intruder situation?" he asks into his comm,
> exiting the cargo hold.
>
> 
>
>
>
